app.title: Google MyMaps KML Extractor
app.description: Extract KML and GPX files from Google MyMaps easily

form.urlPlaceholder: Paste your Google MyMaps URL here...
form.invalidUrlHelp: The URL you entered is not properly formatted. Please check and try again.
form.invalidGoogleMapsHelp: This looks like a Google Maps URL but couldn't extract the map ID. Please check the URL.
form.validUrlNotGoogle: Valid URL detected - possible scan for Google Maps links on it...
form.scrapingPageHelp: We'll try to find Google MyMaps links on this page.

download.title: Download Options
download.kmzDesc: Recommended format with full icon support

scraped.notFoundHelp: The page doesn't contain any recognizable Google MyMaps links.
